name: CopyTaskWithSeveralNodeHandlers
description: Simple task which copies files from one dir to another - with support of several nodejs handlers (node6, node10, node18)
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: Script task consistency. Added support for macOS and Linux.

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the copy will be run from.

inputs.name: DestFolder
inputs.label: Destination Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The destination folder that will be used as target directory.
